name: Inefficient Property Management

image.url: /images/DALLÂ·E 2024-10-03 07.32.26 - A property manager in a cluttered office, looking stressed and overwhelmed. The desk is disorganized with paperwork, keys, and a laptop showing incomp.webp

bio: Managing rental properties can be challenging, from tenant placement to property maintenance and rent collection. Poor management can lead to financial losses and added stress, ultimately impacting investment returns.
